messages.content: Hello, In this part of the interview process we will start with your resume round. Are you ready?
Yes let's start
Can you introduce yourself?
Yes, sure.
Go ahead.
I am Yashraj. I am an economics and Computer Science student. I live in Mumbai and have interests in finance and data science.
Good to know that, Yashraj. Moving on to to the next question, could you tell me more about your project Creditine LMS Integration with OneFin (Ongoing with Phase 1 completed)?
Good question, give me some time to think.
Sure, take your time.
Can I get a hint?
You will get no hints for non skills based questions.
Please stay focused on the interview.
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. What is the goal in the next phase of this project?
No.
Please stay focused on the interview.
I don't know.
Shall we move ahead?
No
You could answer this question or move ahead.
I don't know.
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. Could you tell me more about your project Account-aggregator Integration?
let me think.
Sure, take your time.

It allowed customers to submit their bank statements based on OTP verification rather than providing manual bank pdfs which has reduced friction and has resulted in increased conversion hence increasing profitability of our creditline product
Nice, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question, what was the impact in terms of profitability?
It drove our profitability by over 5%.
Nice, Yashraj. Moving on to the next question. Could you tell me more about your experience at Werize?
I worked in the creditline team. It was a very eye opening experience for me as I got to learn a lot.
Great, Yashraj.Could you tell me what features you added while working at Werize?
I would like to quit this interview round.
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I can continue huh?
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
No
PLease continue with the previous question - Could you tell me what features you added while working at Werize?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Yashraj. This question is being skipped. What were your contributions for code refactoring at Werize?
Who is the president of USA?
Please stay focused on the interview.
Okay, who cares.
As I didn't find any suitable response from you, moving on to the next question. I can see that you've mentioned Springboot as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
I've used springboot in my college projects and personal projects. After college, I've also used it very frequently in my corporate career.
Good to know that, Yashraj. Can we create a non-web application in Spring Boot?
Yes, we can create a non-web application by removing the web dependencies from the classpath along with changing the way Spring Boot creates the application context.
Good to know that, Yashraj. Can we override or replace the Embedded tomcat server in Spring Boot?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Yashraj. What is the difference between RequestMapping and GetMapping?
Can I get a hint?
Sure,RequestMapping can be used with many request methods.
Can I get another hint?
You have already been provided with maximum number of hints
Sure.
Please continue.

RequestMapping can be used with GET, POST, PUT, and many other request methods using the method attribute on the annotation. Whereas getMapping is only an extension of RequestMapping which helps you to improve on clarity on request
Nice, Yashraj.Moving on to the next question. I can see that you've mentioned Django as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
Could you reschedule this interview?
This interview can only be rescheduled once if you currently aren't retaking it.You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I wish to continue.
Please continue with previous question - I can see that you've mentioned Django as your skill. Could you tell me more about it?
Let's skip to the next question.
Okay, Nishant. This question is being skipped. Can you tell me what are Django URLs?

URLs are one of the most important parts of a web application and Django provides you with an elegant way to design your own custom URLs with help of its module known as URLconf (URL Configuration). The basic functionality of this python module is to. You can design your own URLs in Django in the way you like and then map them to the python function (View function). These URLs can be static as well as dynamic. These URLs as present in the urls.py where they are matched with the equivalent view function.
Nice, Nishant. What are views in Django?
Can I get a hint?
Sure, it is related to web response.
Can I get another hint?
You have already been provided with maximum number of hints
I would like to quit this interview round.
You have an option to continue this round later. Do you want to exit?
I would like to quit this interview.
Okay Yashraj ,thank you for your time. You can click on exit to leave this interview. We will get back to you soon.
Thanks.
You will be able to see the results as well as the feedback on EvaluAItor dashboard. Goodbye and have a good day ahead.
